articles.content: Each of our cells usually has about 2 m (6 feet) of genomic DNA, which needs to be folded into a cell nucleus of approximately 10 m in diameter. This level of packaging is equivalent to packing the c… [+1122 chars]

articles.title: Moon phase today: What the moon will look like on November 3 - Mashable
articles.description: The moon isn't full quite yet.
